title: How is the TalkBand B2 different from the TalkBand B1?
answer: The TalkBand B1 is geared more towards fitness enthusiasts while the TalkBand B2 is more suited for a business-friendly setting. The TalkBand B2 features a 6-axis sensor with more accurate movement identification and appeals in a professional setting with its classy gold screen and leather strap. The TalkBand B2 features a touch screen, can connect with two phones simultaneously, and can be used to locate and control your phone.
